Package it.apice.sapere.node.agents

This package contains the SAPEREagents taxonomy.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
LSAspaceAccessPolicy This interface models a proxy capable of filtering requests to the LSA-space and forward only the allowed ones.
NodeServices Basic interface for the entity capable of retrieving a reference to each node service.
SAPEREAgent This interface models a generic agent running on the SAPERE middleware.
SAPEREAgentsFactory This interface models a service capable of creating (local) SAPEREAgents on a SAPERE-node.
SAPEREAgentSpec This interface represents the specification of a SAPEREAgent behaviour.
SAPERESysAgentSpec This interface represents the specification of a SAPEREAgent behaviour.
 

Class Summary
AbstractAccessPolicy This class is conceived in order to analyze the requests that an agent forwards and filter out those whose are not legal according to some SAPEREmodel constraint.
AbstractSystemAgent This class provides a basic realization of a SAPERE System Agent, which is an agent concerned with system administration task.
 

Package it.apice.sapere.node.agents Description

This package contains the SAPEREagents taxonomy.
